name: Double Espresso
description: A bold double shot of our finest espresso beans, delivering intense flavor with a perfect crema.

name: Americano
description: Espresso shots topped with hot water, creating a light layer of crema for a rich yet smooth taste.

name: Flat White
description: Velvety microfoam over a double ristretto shot, creating the perfect coffee-to-milk balance.

name: Latte
description: Espresso with steamed milk and a light layer of foam, offering a creamy coffee experience.

name: Cappuccino
description: Equal parts espresso, steamed milk and silky foam, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Macchiato
description: Espresso 'stained' with a dollop of foamed milk, perfect for those who enjoy strong coffee with a touch of creaminess.

name: Mocha
description: Rich espresso combined with chocolate syrup and steamed milk, topped with whipped cream.

name: Freddo Espresso
description: Chilled double espresso shaken to create a rich, creamy foam, served over ice cubes in a tall glass.

name: Freddo Cappuccino
description: Iced espresso topped with cold frothed milk, creating distinct layers of coffee and creamy foam.

name: Iced Americano
description: Chilled espresso shots poured over ice and topped with cold water for a refreshing strong coffee.

name: Iced Latte
description: Espresso poured over ice and topped with cold milk, creating a refreshing creamy coffee drink.

name: Mountain Tea
description: Traditional Greek herbal infusion from wild sideritis plants, known for its antioxidant properties and earthy flavor.

name: English Breakfast
description: Robust black tea blend perfect for morning enjoyment, served with lemon or milk.

name: Green Tea
description: Delicate Japanese sencha leaves brewed at perfect temperature to preserve antioxidants.

name: Camomile Tea
description: Soothing herbal infusion with apple-like flavor, perfect for relaxation.

name: Earl Grey
description: Classic black tea scented with bergamot oil, offering citrusy floral notes.

name: Peppermint Tea
description: Invigorating pure peppermint leaves infusion, naturally caffeine-free.

name: Fresh Mint Tea
description: Hand-picked mint leaves steeped in hot water, refreshing and digestive.

name: Hot Chocolate
description: Rich melted chocolate mixed with steamed milk, topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Matcha Latte
description: Vibrant Japanese matcha powder whisked with steamed milk, offering earthy sweetness.

name: Fresh Squeezed Orange Juice
description: Cold-pressed from organic oranges, packed with vitamin C and served unpasteurized.

name: Apple, Carrot & Ginger Juice
description: Revitalizing combination of sweet apples, earthy carrots and spicy fresh ginger root.

name: Banana, Orange & Apple Juice
description: Creamy banana blended with citrusy orange and crisp apple for balanced sweetness.

name: Sunset Splash
description: Tropical blend of banana, strawberry, mango and cherry with yogurt base, vibrant in color and flavor.

name: Golden Globe
description: Sunshine in a glass with pineapple, mango, melon and kiwi, rich in vitamin C.

name: Acai Kick
description: Antioxidant powerhouse featuring acai berry with mango, banana and blueberry.

name: Dr Detox
description: Green goodness with broccoli, spinach, pineapple and mango for an energizing cleanse.

name: Coca Cola/Zero
description: Classic cola served ice cold in a glass bottle.

name: Fanta
description: Sparkling orange soda, refreshingly sweet with citrus notes.

name: Still Water
description: Premium local mineral water, naturally filtered through mountain springs.

name: Sparkling Water
description: Naturally carbonated mineral water with crisp effervescence.

name: Ayran
description: Traditional yogurt drink with salt, perfectly refreshing on hot days.

name: Plant Milk Options
description: Oat, soya, coconut or almond milk alternative for any drink.

name: Flavor Shots
description: Vanilla or caramel syrup to sweeten and flavor your beverage.
